arabic_text: وَءَاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَلَا تُبَذِّرۡ تَبۡذِيرًا
translation: (26) And give the relative his right, and [also] the poor and the traveler, and do not spend wastefully.[737]
footnotes: [737]- i.e., on that which is unlawful or in disobedience to Allāh.
